org.apache.spark.sql

Interface RDDApi<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataFrame

    public interface RDDApi<T>
    An internal interface defining the RDD-like methods for DataFrame. Please use DataFrame directly, and do NOT use this.
